children.text:
Now, the Fortran program structure: Program main

   implicit none

   integer :: n, k, i, req, remaining_k

   character(len=20) :: s

   integer :: a1, a2, len_s

   ! First part: compute remaining_k

   read*, n, k

   i =1

   req =1

   do while (k >= req)

      k = k - req i = i +1

      if (mod(i, n) ==0) then

         req =n

      else

         req = mod(i, n)

      end if

   end do

   remaining_k =k

   ! Convert remaining_k to string s

   write(s, '(I0)') remaining_k

   s = adjustl(s)

   ! Second part: process s

   a1 =0

   a2 =0

   ! Compute a1

   character(len=len_trim(s)) :: a = s

   do i=2, len_trim(a)

      if (a(i:i) == a(i-1:i-1)) then

         if (a(i:i) == '1') then

            a(i:i) = '0'

         else

            a(i:i) = '1'

         end if

         a1 = a1 +1

      end if

   end do

   ! Compute a2

   character(len=len_trim(s)) :: b = s

   do i = len_trim(b), 2, -1

      if (b(i:i) == b(i-1:i-1)) then

         if (b(i-1:i-1) == '1') then

            b(i-1:i-1) = '0'

         else

            b(i-1:i-1) = '1'

         end if

         a2 = a2 +1

      end if

   end do

   !

Program main

   implicit none

   integer :: n, k, i, req, remaining_k

   character(len=20) :: s

   integer :: a1, a2, len_s

   ! First part: compute remaining_k

   read*, n, k

   i =1

   req =1

   do while (k >= req)

      k = k - req

      i = i +1

      if (mod(i, n) ==0) then

         req =n

      else

         req = mod(i, n)

      end if

   end do

   remaining_k =k

   ! Convert remaining_k to string s

   write(s, '(I0)') remaining_k

   s = adjustl(s)

   ! Second part: process s

   a1 =0

   a2 =0

   ! Compute a1

   character(len=len_trim(s)) :: a = s

   do i=2, len_trim(a)

      if (a(i:i) == a(i-1:i-1)) then

         if (a(i:i) == '1') then

            a(i:i) = '0'

         else

            a(i:i) = '1'

         end if

         a1 = a1 +1

      end if

   end do

   ! Compute a2

   character(len=len_trim(s)) :: b = s

   do i = len_trim(b), 2, -1

      if (b(i:i) == b(i-1:i-1)) then

         if (b(i-1:i-1) == '1') then

            b(i-1:i-1) = '0'

         else

            b(i-1:i-1) = '1'

         end if

         a2 = a2 +1

      end if

   end do

   ! Output the minimum

   print*, min(a1, a2)

end program main
